stimulusHtml: What are the values of  a,  b,  and  x  after the code segment is executed?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

int x = 7; 
int y = 4; 
boolean a = false; 
boolean b = false; 
 
if (x > y) 
{ 
   if (x % y >= 3) 
   { 
      a = true; 
      x -= y; 
   } 
   else 
   { 
      x += y; 
   } 
} 
 
if (x < y) 
{ 
   if (y % x >= 3) 
   { 
      b = true; 
      x -= y; 
   } 
   else 
   { 
      x += y; 
   } 
}

choicesHtml: a = true,  b = true,  x = -1
a = true,  b = false,  x = 3
a = true,  b = false,  x = 7
a = false,  b = false,  x = 11
